app_subtitle: Learn regular expressions visually and interactively. See how patterns come to life step by step with animations that make regex easy and fun to understand.
start_adventure_subtitle: From zero to regex hero. Each lesson includes interactive examples and explanatory animations.
validation_perfect_description: You found exactly {count} matches as expected.
playground_subtitle: Experiment with your own regex patterns. Write a pattern, add test text and watch matches in real time with visual animations.
text_placeholder: Paste or write the text where you want to find matches...
start_experimenting_description: Enter a regex pattern and test text to see animated matches in real time.
missing_pattern_description: Write a regex pattern to begin
missing_text_description: Add text to search for matches
invalid_pattern_description: Fix the regex pattern to continue
tip_experiment_description: Try different patterns and see how matches change
tip_copy_description: Use copy buttons to save useful patterns
tip_share_description: Share your patterns with others using the share button
tip_learn_description: Use examples to learn common patterns
help_contribute_github: Help us improve or contribute on GitHub
footer_description: Learn regex visually and interactively. Open source educational tool.
flag_g_description: Find all matches, not just the first one
flag_m_description: ^ and $ work at start/end of each line
